name: tsconfig-paths-webpack-plugin
description: Load modules according to tsconfig paths in webpack.
author: Jonas Kello

scripts.example: yarn build && cd example && webpack && node custom-fs.js
scripts.publish:major: yarn run build && node scripts/publish.js major
scripts.publish:minor: yarn run build && node scripts/publish.js minor
scripts.publish:patch: yarn run build && node scripts/publish.js patch
scripts.postversion: git push --tags && yarn publish --new-version $npm_package_version && git push && echo "Successfully released version $npm_package_version!"
